data.name: Warface — Christmas equipment and weapon set
data.detailed_description:
About the "Christmas" set


Note the unusual design of the equipment, which perfectly pairs fighting power with festive colors. All you need to do is actively combine all elements of the equipment and just take down the enemies. You won’t believe how stylish your mercenary will look in this guise.

The set includes 8 class helmets, a vest, gloves, and boots.

Christmas Rifleman Helmet

The rifleman helmet increases the protection of the head by 30% and reduces the effect of flash grenades by 40%.

Christmas Medic Helmet

The medic helmet increases the protection of the head by 30% and reduces the effect of flash grenades by 40%.

Christmas Engineer Helmet

The engineer helmet increases the protection of the head by 30% and allows you to detect enemy mines within a radius of 10 meters.

Christmas Sniper Helmet

The sniper helmet increases the protection of the head by 30% and reduces the effect of flash grenades by 40%.

Aggressive Rifleman Christmas Helmet

The engineer helmet increases the protection of the head by 30%, reduces the effect of flash grenades by 40%, and allows you to detect enemy mines within a radius of 10 meters.

Aggressive Medic Christmas Helmet

The medic helmet increases the protection of the head by 50%, reduces the effect of flash grenades by 40%, and allows you to detect enemy mines within a radius of 10 meters.

Aggressive Engineer Christmas Helmet

The medic helmet increases the protection of the head by 50%, reduces the effect of flash grenades by 40%, and allows you to detect enemy mines within a radius of 10 meters.

Aggressive Sniper Christmas Helmet

The medic helmet increases the protection of the head by 50%, reduces the effect of flash grenades by 40%, and allows you to detect enemy mines within a radius of 10 meters.

Christmas Vest

The vest has 135 armor points and lowers incoming damage by 10 points per hit. Increases protection against explosives by 25%, and also increases ammunition capacity for both primary and secondary weapons by 50%.

Christmas Gloves

The gloves increase the reloading and weapons changing speed by 20%.

Christmas Boots

Increase the sprint speed by 15% and its duration by 10%.

About the "Glacier" set


The set stands out thanks to its original appearance and colorful frosty animation. Warning, these guns are straight ice, be sure to wear gloves!

The set includes 6 weapons and a cool knife.

Glacier Cobalt Kinetics EDGE Rifle

This is a rifleman weapon with impressive damage and high accuracy. This model is effective at practically any distance and is able to take down your target with one headshot. The weapon will become an excellent asset in solving tactical problems of any complexity due to the variability of use of 5 unique attachments.



Glacier Typhoon F12 Custom

Its balanced characteristics make this weapon a versatile choice for different situations and modes: so you do not have to constantly change the weapons according to combat conditions. Its high accuracy in comparison to other shotguns will effectively make quick work of enemies that get too close.



Glacier Cobalt Kinetics Stealth Pistol

This is a machine gun that is most effective at short and medium distances. With this gun, you can eliminate any opponent with just one headshot. The model comes with unique attachments, that make the Cobalt Kinetics Stealth Pistol truly deadly.



Glacier Twenty-Seven Cobalt Kinetics

A product from Cobalt Kinetics that combines the classic charm of a hunting shotgun and the convenience of a modern selective-fire rifle. You can configure the telescopic stock at any moment.



Glacier M134-GAU19b Hybrid

The M134-GAU19b Hybrid differs from other SED guns due to its very high rate of fire. In addition, the novelty overheats faster, but it also cools down faster, which makes the M134-GAU19b Hybrid not very suitable for continuous fire, but rather for shooting in short, but deadly bursts.

Glacier Kel-Tec SUB2000/h2]
"The Kel-Tec Sub2000 is a weapon with high damage and a large magazine capacity. According to its characteristics, this rifle can be called a mixture of two well-known revolvers: the Mateba Autorevolver and the S&W M&P R8.
"

Glacier HX Outdoors Trident

The HX Outdoors Trident has increased attack speed and damage, and an additional attack that allows you to even take down an opponent who’s wearing a Corundum Vest!



Of course, using these weapons can earn you a lot of achievements.

About the "Rime" set


An elegant pattern flows across the body of the guns from this series as if the winter winds left their imprint on the weapons’ cold steel. These guns with colorful designs will help to heat up the battlefield and spread a little magic to even the most hardened opponents!

The set includes the best weapons that bring victory under any circumstances.

The set includes five guns and a killer knife that won’t leave your opponents any chance of survival.

Rime SAI GRY AR-15

The SAI GRY AR-15 is ideal for combat at any distance. Thanks to its high damage and increased limb damage multiplier, this assault rifle can easily deal with even the most formidable enemy. At the same time, the arm has a rather capacious magazine and a modest rate of fire, which allows you to control the ammo consumption, and provides high accuracy in the aiming mode.



Rime SAP6

A good rate of fire and high damage make the SAP6 one of the best pump-action shotguns in the game. Its competitors are MAG-7 and Fabarm STF 12 Compact, which have a similar rate of fire, accuracy, and magazine capacity.



Rime Uzi Pro

The Uzi Pro is the second legendary submachine gun. The main advantages of the gun are its rate of fire, impressive damage multipliers to the body and limbs, comfortable recoil, good range, and a heap of unique attachments.



Rime Gepard GM6 Lynx

This is a semi-automatic weapon sporting high damage and excellent accuracy. The GM6 Lynx will surely appeal to PvP fans: the chance to one-shot any enemy and the possibility to quickly fix a miss make it a formidable weapon.



Rime MPA 930DMG

This weapon will surely appeal to PvP fans: the possibility to fire a burst into the head of an opponent makes this pistol a formidable weapon in your hands.

Rime M48 Bowie

In terms of its specs, the M48 Bowie is very similar to the well-known Katana and Tactical Axe. An additional attack allows its owner to kill opponents in vests providing protection from melee attacks.





Of course, using these weapons can earn you a lot of achievements.



After payment, the items will appear on your in-game account. Wait 15 minutes or restart the game if necessary. All items are permanent.

data.short_description: This equipment will not only look good on your character and cheer up your teammates, but also contribute significantly to your protection in battle! And the weapon sets will delight you with their original looks and colourful frosty animation.
data.supported_languages:
English*, French*, German*, Polish*, Spanish - Spain, Simplified Chinese, Portuguese - Brazil, Korean, Russian*, Turkish
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7, Windows 8, Windows 10
  • Processor: Core i3-530 / AMD Athlon II X3 415e
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 250 GTS / Radeon HD 4850
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 30 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible Sound Card with latest drivers
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7, Windows 8, Windows 10
  • Processor: Core i5 3470 / AMD Athlon 240GE
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 1050 Ti / Radeon R9 380
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 30 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible Sound Card with latest drivers
